summary: Iteration 6: Complete testing of new Categories CRUD/Reorder and Bonus Sites Reorder features. All 15 backend API tests passed (100%). Admin panel now shows 7 tabs as required (Domainler, Siteler, Kategoriler, SEO, Oto İçerik, Makaleler, Maçlar). Categories tab has 7 categories with full CRUD operations and reorder arrows. Sites tab has 8 bonus sites with reorder arrows (up/down). Homepage loads correctly with age verification popup, navigation, categories, bonus sites section.

ui_bugs.issue: Login submit button not visible in viewport on 1080p screens - button is hidden below fold. Form submit via JS works.
ui_bugs.workaround: Form submission via JS or scrolling to button works

issues: Age verification popup shows on every visit - consider localStorage persistence (same as previous iterations)

action_items: Consider adding scroll margin or repositioning login button to ensure visibility on smaller viewports
Consider localStorage persistence for age verification popup state
critical_code_review_comments: Categories CRUD endpoints working correctly (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, POST /reorder)
Bonus sites reorder endpoint (POST /bonus-sites/reorder) working correctly
GET /api/bonus-sites returns sites sorted by sort_order
GET /api/categories returns categories sorted by order field
GET /api/site/{domain_name} returns domain-specific data with articles and bonus sites
POST /api/domains triggers background AI content generation
Admin panel UI has proper data-testid attributes for testing
Reorder arrows (ArrowUp/ArrowDown) visible in both Categories and Sites tabs
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_categories_reorder.py (created - 15 test cases for Categories CRUD, Bonus Sites Reorder, Domain Site Data)

success_rate.frontend: 100% (Admin login, 7 tabs verified, Kategoriler tab, Siteler tab, Homepage all working)

seed_data_creation: Test data created and cleaned up via pytest - TEST_ prefixed domain deleted after test
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 6 added Categories CRUD + reorder and Bonus Sites reorder features. All 7 admin tabs functional (Domainler, Siteler, Kategoriler, SEO, Oto İçerik, Makaleler, Maçlar). Current counts: 1 Domain (guncelgiris.ai), 8 Bonus Sites, 11 Articles, 7 Categories. Categories and Sites tabs both have working reorder arrows. Login button may require scrolling on smaller viewports.

endpoints_tested.GET /api/categories: Returns 7 categories sorted by order - PASS
endpoints_tested.POST /api/categories/reorder: Reorders categories by ID list - PASS
endpoints_tested.GET /api/bonus-sites: Returns 8 sites sorted by sort_order - PASS
endpoints_tested.POST /api/bonus-sites/reorder: Reorders sites by ID list - PASS
endpoints_tested.GET /api/site/guncelgiris.ai: Returns domain-specific data with articles and bonus sites - PASS
endpoints_tested.POST /api/domains: Creates domain and triggers auto content generation - PASS

ui_components_tested.Admin Login Page (/admin-login): Form works, login button requires form submit via Enter or JS - PASS with workaround
ui_components_tested.Admin Panel 7 Tabs: All 7 tabs visible and clickable (Domainler, Siteler, Kategoriler, SEO, Oto İçerik, Makaleler, Maçlar) - PASS
ui_components_tested.Kategoriler Tab: Create form (name, type, image, description), 7 category rows with reorder arrows, edit/delete - PASS
ui_components_tested.Siteler Tab: Create form, 8 site rows with reorder arrows (up/down with numbers), edit/delete/external link - PASS
ui_components_tested.Homepage (/): Age verification popup, hero section, navigation, footer, categories, bonus sites - PASS
